title: [VXN] Vixen Esports - Looking for Top Laner and Support! MASTER1+
body:
Hello, we are a new Esports organisation that's looking for a top laner and support. Please contact me by adding me in game (Hoodlum) or email me at tommy.van@hilarious.com

NOTE: Please do not apply if you do not fully main these roles, as we only want people who knows what they're doing and not someone who plays in another lane, and doesn't main support or top.

replies.body: I think I am applicable, add me validus
